name: Rahu Lumina
description:
This is our submission for the Global Game Jam 2021.

The theme was "Lost and Found"

In the game you play as Rahu on it's quest to recover lost constellations in a damn world, this will give unlimited power to it's holder.

The Team:

Itzel "Noisy Panda" González Estrada
Efectos de sonido y narrativa | Sound effects and narrative

Valeria "Cadstor"
Entornos | Environments

Sebastián "Tatán"
Personajes y GUI | Characters and GUI

Juan "Quiet Gecko" Carlos García Ángel
Música y programación | Music and programming

Mateo "Carenalga" Robayo Rodríguez
Programación | Programming
